name: Rogue Gemini (Prototype v0.2)
description:
An action RPG with fast tag-team combat, 3 weapon types, and loads of loot and special attacks to find! Challenge the dungeons, die, and try again with better equipment!

Get creative with the versatile Swap mechanic, like using it to chain specials together, juggle opponents, or protect a vulnerable character.

Controller Supported!

If you like it, you can follow me on Twitter to keep track of progress: https://twitter.com/RendahGames

Note - This is a prototype for a game that may never come out.
